attributes.action: Ban the sale of fireworks to the general public - Licensed public displays only
attributes.additional_details: Too many people abuse the use of fireworks chasing misery, damage and injuries to other people and animals
attributes.background: Ban the sale of all fireworks to the general public, only licensed public displays allowed

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891
